* `\w`  -  word character
* `\d`  -  digit
* `\s`  -  space
* `\b`  -  word boundary

* `.`  - wild card (matches anything)

## Multipliers
* `?`  - optionality:  0 or 1
* `+`  - one or more
* `*`  - 0 or more
* `{99,99}` -  where 99 is a digit
